name: Günther
description:
To store how many fish you have gotten go onto the ice platform .Use A to move to the left and D to move to the right. When you are underwater you can aim with your mouse to steere gunther. There is also a pause key (Escape/E). If you manage to get all 100 fish to the platform there is a “Cutscene” Hope you enjoy <3

If you can't beat the game or dont have time you can watch the ending if you click the link below(It's not as fun if you dont do it yourself!)

---SPOILER---
https://streamable.com/0e1o6f
---SPOILER---
